backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, debate state management, agent registry with pre-populated core agents (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, etc.), file metadata storage, and boardroom debate orchestration with mixins for blob storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of useClearBoardroom mutation hook, Download/Trash2 icons, handleDownloadTranscript function, 3-column grid layout, and Session Management card with high confidence test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including App.tsx with BoardroomTab and SwarmHealthTab, custom hooks for speech recognition/synthesis, transcript parsing utilities, and component implementations with strict early return patterns and error handling.
frontend/.env: Development environment configuration with local backend canister ID (bkyz2-fmaaa-aaaaa-qaaaq-cai) and DFX_NETWORK set to local.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment configuration with production backend canister ID and DFX_NETWORK set to ic (Internet Computer mainnet).
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH-based neutral grayscale color palette for light and dark modes, supporting tactical dark aesthetic for technical backend infrastructure project.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for 'The Gang' application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with BoardroomTab featuring push-to-talk, interrupt, and session management (download/clear transcript) in 3-column grid, plus SensoryCortexTab and AgentRegistryTable with strict hook ordering before conditional returns.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table with kill switch toggles using arrow functions in onCheckedChange handlers, comprehensive try/catch/finally error handling that always resets updatingId state, and tactical dark aesthetic with real-time status indicators.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Displays debate transcript with color-coded speaker messages (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, SYSTEM, User), emergency mode badge, and text-to-speech playback for Robby's messages when authenticated.
Provides a button to interrupt/stop an ongoing debate by canceling speech synthesis and calling the backend abort mutation.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: Implements push-to-talk speech recognition with start/stop controls, processes transcripts on completion, and includes fix to prevent infinite loop by removing transcript from useEffect dependencies.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: Handles file uploads (drag-drop, manual, camera) with chunked processing (1.8MB chunks), extracts text/image previews, and routes documents to appropriate agents via backend mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with delegation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for debate operations (start, abort, clear, status polling), agent registry management, and document routing with optimized polling intervals to prevent infinite loops.
Custom React hook that wraps the browser's Web Speech Recognition API to provide speech-to-text functionality with state management for listening status, transcript, errors, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom React hook that wraps the browser's Speech Synthesis API to provide text-to-speech functionality with voice selection (prioritizing British male voices) and speaking state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub file containing placeholder code for integrating Picovoice Porcupine wake word detection to trigger speech recognition automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space, plus base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient provider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes transcript text by stripping HTML table tags and converting URLs and markdown-style links into clickable anchor elements with styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space with CSS variables, container settings, extended theme properties, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build configuration for React app with environment variable injection for canister IDs, path aliases, and local development proxy setup for API requests to port 4943.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting existing features for session management UI (download transcript and clear boardroom functionality) with requirements mapping and feature implementation status.
